text: Rare Stone Museum (Thai: พิพิธภัณฑ์หินแปลก) is a museum that was previously in Bang Rak District in Bangkok, Thailand, but moved in 2008 to a new site in Pathum Thani Province, north of Bangkok. The museum continues to show a collection of rare or unusual stones and fossils.https://thailandtopvote.com/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%93%E0%B8%91%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/ ==References== Category:Geology museums in Thailand Category:Buildings and structures in Pathum Thani Province Category:Natural history museums in Thailand Category:Tourist attractions in Pathum Thani Province
title: Rare Stone Museum
